review: Great product. I've had it for about a month now and I use it pretty much everyday and have nothing but good things to say. Easy to use and has everything I need for a great price. Better than a smart tv (and cheaper) because it can be interchanged between tvs.
author: Emily Halphen

review: Have a old flat screen TV and this works perfectly for all my streaming needs. Use it for Netflix, Amazon Prime Instant, and cloud pictures.
author: John Suvajac

review: Set up was easy and it's meeting all expectations so far.
